Colour

Primary colour pallete

  • Mid blue #0b55a8
  • Light blue #a6d0ff
  • Gold #ffc23d
  • Dark blue #002158
  • Dark grey #312b39
  • White #ffffff

Secondary colour pallete

  • Purple #880088
  • Dark purple #470d43
  • Mid grey blue #929fb0
  • Light grey blue #e7eff7

Emphasis colours

  • Green #539d3c
  • Red #b52a1e
  • Orange #cf6041

Colour classes

Note: you should always make sure the colour combinations you are creating provide enough contrast for any text to be fully legible. There is an online tool for checking the accessibility of foreground/background combos.

Colour

Change the CSS "color" property on an item to use an OU pallette colour:

  • .colour1 = green
  • .colour2 = red
  • .colour3 = gold
  • .colour4 = dark purple
  • .colour5 = mid blue
  • .colour6 = light blue
  • .colour7 = dark blue
  • .colour8 = dark grey
  • .colour9 = purple
  • .colour10 = mid grey blue
  • .colour11 = light grey blue
  • .colour12 = orange

For example:

Change this to OU orange

Change this to OU orange

Background colour

Change the CSS "background-color" property of an item to use an OU pallette colour:

  • .bg-colour1 = green
  • .bg-colour2 = red
  • .bg-colour3 = gold
  • .bg-colour4 = dark purple
  • .bg-colour5 = mid blue
  • .bg-colour6 = light blue
  • .bg-colour7 = dark blue
  • .bg-colour8 = dark grey
  • .bg-colour9 = purple
  • .bg-colour10 = mid grey blue
  • .bg-colour11 = light grey blue
  • .bg-colour12 = orange

For example:

Change this background to OU gold

Change this background to OU gold
